description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcpfj","text":"This protocol describes a low-throughput genetic screen to identify glycolytic enzymes that improve neuronal function under hypometabolic conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Phosphoglycerate kinase is a central leverage point in Parkinsonâ€™s Disease driven neuronal metabolic deficits.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dnqv9","text":"Use cultured rodent primary hippocampal neurons, transfected with vGlutI-pH, mTagBFP2 and a construct expressing a single glycolytic enzyme, as explained in dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.ewov1qxr2gr2/v1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":157,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpb7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9B8582C83D5311EFAAA70A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.ewov1qxr2gr2/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfb5s","text":"Mount the coverslips with the cells on the imaging chamber and image as explained in dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.q26g7pn4qgwz/v1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"722B1AFD3D5911EFAAA70A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.q26g7pn4qgwz/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48kpn","text":"Remove the cells from the incubator and bathe them in Tyrodes containing 0.1 mM glucose.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15nj","text":"Locate cells in an unbiased manner using the mTagBPF2 channel and center on their axon, judging by their morphology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5c5fp","text":"After a total of   that the cells have been in the 0.1 mM glucose tyrode buffer, start the live-cell imaging experiment in the vGlutI-pH channel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"j15o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vsnf","text":"Stimulate the cells with 100 APs delivered at 10 Hz every  , for a total of 10 rounds of activity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7agsq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"caju1","text":"At the end of the experiment, perfuse cells with Tyrodes containing 50 mM NH4Cl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":76,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Genetic expression suppressor screen
